title_en: Access to Basic Amenities by State & District
title_ms: Akses kepada Kemudahan Asas mengikut Negeri & Daerah
description_en: Proportion of households with access to basic amenities such as electricity, piped water, and sanitary latrines by state and district.
description_ms: Nisbah isi rumah dengan akses kepada kemudahan asas seperti elektrik, air paip, dan tandas sempurna mengikut negeri dan daerah.
methodology_en: This data represents estimates of households' access to various basic amenities, and is tabulated from household-level survey data collected via the Household Income and Expenditure Survey (HIES), which is conducted at least twice within any 5-year period. For full details on the methodology, especially on the nuances involved in sampling, please refer to the [technical notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
methodology_ms: Set data ini memaparkan anggaran akses isi rumah kepada pelbagai kemudahan asas, dan dirangka daripada data survey peringkat isi rumah yang dikumpukan melalui Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES), yang dilaksanakan sekurang-kurangnya dua kali dalam mana-mana tempoh 5 tahun. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, terutamanya mengenai nuansanya metodologi survei, sila rujuk kepada [nota teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
publication_en: The [Household Income Survey Report, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), the latest edition of the household income statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on household income](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) which enables you to explore Malaysia's household income data interactively.
publication_ms: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik pendapatan isi rumah yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM juga membekalkan [_dashboard_ pendapatan isi rumah](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) yang membolehkan anda menerokai data pendapatan isi rumah Malaysia secara interaktif.

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 16 states, including the 3 Federal Territories
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Satu daripada 16 negeri, termasuk 3 Wilayah Persekutuan

fields.name: district
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 160 administrative districts, including the 4 states (Perlis and the 3 Federal Territories) which do not have subdivisions, or 'All Districts' for the state totals
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Satu daripada 160 daerah pentadbiran, termasuk 4 negeri (Perlis dan 3 Wilayah Persekutuan) yang tidak dipecahkan lagi, atau 'Semua Daerah' untuk jumlah keseluruhan negeri

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 as the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: sanitation
fields.description_en: [Float] Percentage of households covered by sanitary latrines
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Peratusan isi rumah yang diliputi oleh tandas sempurna

fields.description_ms: [Apung] Peratusan isi rumah yang mempunyai akses kepada bekalan elektrik di rumah
